languages.text: "Прошу прощения, Ваша Светлость. Я почувствовал... странность в вас. Разум сам потянулся к ней, и я видел совсем немногое. Но этого хватило. Мне жаль, что... оно... тяготит вас. Поверьте, я знаю, как тяжело бремя рока".

"My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I sensed... a strangeness in you, and my mind reached out of its own accord. I did not see much, but what I did see was enough. It grieves me to know that this... mark... weighs on you so. Trust me, I am well acquainted with the oppressive burden of doom."
languages.original_text: "Прошу прощения, Ваша Светлость. Я почувствовал... странность в вас. Разум сам потянулся к ней, и я видел совсем немногое. Но этого хватило. Мне жаль, что... оно... тяготит вас. Поверьте, я знаю, как тяжело бремя рока".

languages.text: "Verzeiht mir, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich spürte ... eine Absonderlichkeit in Euch und mein Verstand hat sich selbstständig gemacht. Ich habe nicht viel gesehen, aber was ich sah, hat gereicht. Es schmerzt mich, zu wissen, dass dieses ... Mal ... so schwer auf Euch lastet. Glaubt mir, ich bin mit der erdrückenden Bürde des Untergangs bestens vertraut."
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I sensed... a strangeness in you, and my mind reached out of its own accord. I did not see much, but what I did see was enough. It grieves me to know that this... mark... weighs on you so. Trust me, I am well acquainted with the oppressive burden of doom."

traits.locale_text: "Verzeiht mir, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}." Ich spürte ... eine Absonderlichkeit in Euch und mein Verstand hat sich selbstständig gemacht. Ich habe nicht viel gesehen, aber was ich sah, hat gereicht. Es schmerzt mich, zu wissen, dass dieses ... Mal ... so schwer auf Euch lastet. Glaubt mir, ich bin mit der erdrückenden Bürde des Untergangs bestens vertraut."

languages.text: « Toutes mes excuses, Votre Seigneurie. J'ai senti une certaine... étrangeté en vous, et mon esprit a spontanément cherché à sonder votre âme. Je n'ai pas vu grand-chose, mais c'est amplement suffisant. Je suis navré d'apprendre que cette... marque... vous pèse à ce point. Croyez-moi, je connais mieux que personne le fardeau oppressant de la fatalité. »
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I sensed... a strangeness in you, and my mind reached out of its own accord. I did not see much, but what I did see was enough. It grieves me to know that this... mark... weighs on you so. Trust me, I am well acquainted with the oppressive burden of doom."

traits.locale_text: « Toutes mes excuses, Votre Seigneurie. J'ai senti une certaine... étrangeté en vous, et mon esprit a spontanément cherché à sonder votre âme. Je n'ai pas vu grand-chose, mais c'est amplement suffisant. Je suis navré d'apprendre que cette... marque... vous pèse à ce point. Croyez-moi, je connais mieux que personne le fardeau oppressant de la fatalité. »

languages.text: «Lo lamento, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Había sentido algo... extraño en usted y mi mente actuó por cuenta propia. No he podido ver mucho, pero sí suficiente. Me duele saber que esta... marca... le oprime así. Créame, conozco bien el peso que supone una condena semejante».
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I sensed... a strangeness in you, and my mind reached out of its own accord. I did not see much, but what I did see was enough. It grieves me to know that this... mark... weighs on you so. Trust me, I am well acquainted with the oppressive burden of doom."

traits.locale_text: «Lo lamento, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Había sentido algo... extraño en usted y mi mente actuó por cuenta propia. No he podido ver mucho, pero sí suficiente. Me duele saber que esta... marca... le oprime así. Créame, conozco bien el peso que supone una condena semejante».

languages.text: 「申し訳ありません、陛下。私はあなたに…何か妙なものを感じまして、私の精神が勝手に手を伸ばしてしまったのです。あまり見えはしませんでしたが、それで十分でした。この…痕跡が…あなたに重くのしかかっているのだと知り、悲しく思っております。信じてください。私は過酷な運命の苦しみをよく知っているのです」
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I sensed... a strangeness in you, and my mind reached out of its own accord. I did not see much, but what I did see was enough. It grieves me to know that this... mark... weighs on you so. Trust me, I am well acquainted with the oppressive burden of doom."

traits.locale_text: 「申し訳ありません、陛下。私はあなたに…何か妙なものを感じまして、私の精神が勝手に手を伸ばしてしまったのです。あまり見えはしませんでしたが、それで十分でした。この…痕跡が…あなたに重くのしかかっているのだと知り、悲しく思っております。信じてください。私は過酷な運命の苦しみをよく知っているのです」

languages.text: “我很抱歉，大人。我感觉到……您身上带着陌生的痕迹，于是我的意识不由自主地靠了过去。虽然我没有看到太多内容，但我看到的那些已经足够了。这样的……印记……沉重地压在您的灵魂之上，我为此大受震撼。相信我，大人，我非常熟悉厄运压身的感觉。”
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I sensed... a strangeness in you, and my mind reached out of its own accord. I did not see much, but what I did see was enough. It grieves me to know that this... mark... weighs on you so. Trust me, I am well acquainted with the oppressive burden of doom."

traits.locale_text: “我很抱歉，大人。我感觉到……您身上带着陌生的痕迹，于是我的意识不由自主地靠了过去。虽然我没有看到太多内容，但我看到的那些已经足够了。这样的……印记……沉重地压在您的灵魂之上，我为此大受震撼。相信我，大人，我非常熟悉厄运压身的感觉。”

languages.text: "Özürlerimi sunarım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Sizde... Bir tuhaflık sezdim. Zihnim de istemeden sizinkine ulaştı. Fazla bir şey görmedim ama gördüklerim bana yetti. Bu... İşaretin... Size böylesine yük olduğunu görmek bana hüzün veriyor. Bana güvenebilirsiniz, felaketin zulmeden yüküne aşinayımdır."
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I sensed... a strangeness in you, and my mind reached out of its own accord. I did not see much, but what I did see was enough. It grieves me to know that this... mark... weighs on you so. Trust me, I am well acquainted with the oppressive burden of doom."
